attributes.action: Get The Labour Party to prove categorically, that Tories left a £22B Black Hole.
attributes.additional_details: Admit they have not adhered to their Pre General Election Manifesto and promises.
attributes.background: Prove that their wa a £22 billion black hole as this is labours justification in their general election promise being broken.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Investigate the claims of £22 Billion black hole
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700170
